modShortDescription: Adds 2 new doors: Modern door - default (open - close sound) and Modern door 2 - self (open - close sound).
modDescription:
Adds 2 new [doors](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-doors/):

* Modern door – default (open – close sound)
* Modern door 2 – self (open – close sound)

## Changelog

Fixed error mesh read/write on Modern door.
